sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnfilesysmntrng ( FILE_SYS_ID /* */ , FILE_SYS_NM /* */ , FILE_SYS_MANAGE_NM /* */ , FILE_SYS_SIZE /* */ , FILE_SYS_THRHLD /* */ , FILE_SYS_USGQTY /* */ , MNGR_NM /* */ , MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES /* */ , MNTRNG_STTUS /* */ , CREAT_DT /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ ) VALUES ( #fileSysId# /* */ , #fileSysNm# /* */ , #fileSysManageNm# /* */ , #fileSysSize# /* */ , #fileSysThrhld# /* */ , #fileSysUsgqty# /* */ , #mngrNm# /* */ , #mngrEmailAdres# /* */ , #mntrngSttus# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #frstRegisterId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #lastUpdusrId# /* */ , #lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnfilesysmntrng SET FILE_SYS_ID=#fileSysId# /* */ , FILE_SYS_NM=#fileSysNm# /* */ , FILE_SYS_MANAGE_NM=#fileSysManageNm# /* */ , FILE_SYS_SIZE=#fileSysSize# /* */ , FILE_SYS_THRHLD=#fileSysThrhld# /* */ , FILE_SYS_USGQTY=#fileSysUsgqty# /* */ , MNGR_NM=#mngrNm# /* */ , MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES=#mngrEmailAdres# /* */ , MNTRNG_STTUS=#mntrngSttus# /* */ , CREAT_DT=#creatDt# /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID=#frstRegisterId# /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM=#frstRegistPnttm# /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID=#lastUpdusrId# /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM=#lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ WHERE FILE_SYS_ID=#fileSysId# /* */
sqlMap.select: SELECT FILE_SYS_ID /* */ , FILE_SYS_NM /* */ , FILE_SYS_MANAGE_NM /* */ , FILE_SYS_SIZE /* */ , FILE_SYS_THRHLD /* */ , FILE_SYS_USGQTY /* */ , MNGR_NM /* */ , MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES /* */ , MNTRNG_STTUS /* */ , CREAT_DT /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ FROM comtnfilesysmntrng WHERE FILE_SYS_ID=#fileSysId# /* */

SELECT FILE_SYS_ID /* */ , FILE_SYS_NM /* */ , FILE_SYS_MANAGE_NM /* */ , FILE_SYS_SIZE /* */ , FILE_SYS_THRHLD /* */ , FILE_SYS_USGQTY /* */ , MNGR_NM /* */ , MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES /* */ , MNTRNG_STTUS /* */ , CREAT_DT /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ FROM comtnfilesysmntrng WHERE 1=1
FILE_SYS_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
FILE_SYS_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
ORDER BY FILE_SYS_ID DESC /* */ limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnfilesysmntrng WHERE 1=1
FILE_SYS_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
FILE_SYS_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
